meanings.definition: Resembling a block in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The toy with the blockiest shape was the easiest to stack.
meanings.sent2: The building had the blockiest design on the street.
meanings.sent3: The blockiest cake I've ever seen was a square birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: Her head felt like the blockiest block after hitting it on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The blockiest rock in the garden stood out among the smooth pebbles.

meanings.definition: Having the most block-like qualities among a group.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the shapes, the square was the blockiest one.
meanings.sent2: Among the cars, the jeep looked the blockiest.
meanings.sent3: The blockiest pumpkin won the contest for its perfect cube shape.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him the blockiest person in the room.
meanings.sent5: The blockiest building in the city was a massive concrete structure.

meanings.definition: To make something appear more block-like.
meanings.sent1: She used large legos to blockiest her creation.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to blockiest the sculpture by adding sharp edges.
meanings.sent3: He tried to blockiest his sandwich by cutting it into perfect squares.
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick was to blockiest the shape of the object before revealing it.
meanings.sent5: The designer wanted to blockiest the furniture to match the room's theme.
